name: Spiked (Blue_Giant)
description:
Spiked is a small game where you must move constantly to survive. Use the unique movement to move from wall to wall to avoid the spikes that come out of the walls. 

Try to complete the levels of each zone, or test your skills in 'Endless Mode' to see how long you can survive. 

Spiked is based off an earlier project of mine entitled 'Spikeful', which you can check out here.
